TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit IntegerValidator extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationValidatorBase

span.span: Provides validation of an value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別用來確保整數符合特定準則。The class is used to ensure that an integer meets specific criteria. 執行個體時，會建立驗證準則類別建立。The criteria for validation are established when an instance of the class is created. 具有兩個參數的建構函式可確保正在驗證的整數，符合最小值和最大值。The constructor with two parameters ensures that the integer being verified adheres to both a minimum and a maximum value. 最小值和最大值的三個參數的建構函式會檢查值，以及要驗證值是否在指定範圍內。The constructor with three parameters checks both the minimum and maximum values, as well as whether the value to be validated is within the specified range. 四個參數的建構函式會檢查先前的三個參數，以及也檢查是否值相當於特定的解析度。The constructor with four parameters checks the previous three parameters and also checks whether the value is equal to a specific resolution. 方法會判斷要驗證的物件型別是否符合預期的類型。The method determines whether the object type being validated matches the expected type. 正在驗證的物件會傳遞做為參數的方法。The object being validated is passed as a parameter of the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用型別。The following code example demonstrates how to use the type. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這建構函式可確保正在驗證的整數，符合最小值和最大長度。This constructor ensures that the integer being verified adheres to both a minimum and a maximum length.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立的執行個體時類別，這最小值和最大值的建構函式會檢查值，以及是否驗證範圍是獨占。When creating an instance of the class, this constructor checks both the minimum and maximum values, as well as whether the validation range is exclusive. 當`rangeIsExclusive`參數設定為`true`、值不能介於`minValue`和`maxValue`參數值。When the `rangeIsExclusive` parameter is set to `true`, the value must not be between the `minValue` and `maxValue` parameter values. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用建構函式。The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件包含規則需要驗證的整數物件。An object contains the rules necessary to validate an integer object. 規則的執行個體時，會建立類別建立。The rules are established when an instance of the class is created. 要驗證的整數物件會傳遞做為參數的方法。The integer object to validate is passed as a parameter of the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.IntegerValidator#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.IntegerValidator/CS/IntegerValidator.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.IntegerValidator#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.IntegerValidator/VB/IntegerValidator.vb#4)]
